content: So I want you to know that we will make choices as we assess which items in our portfolio are driving growth, which items in our portfolio, we think, have margins that are at or accretive to our overall margin roadmap and our margin trajectory, and we will make the choices that we need to make, whether that means that we will start ourselves â start retracting from some of the categories that we are in that we donât think can be reimagined to really be up to speed with the margins weâre looking to get as well as considering where we can play that is a fit for The Honest brand that allows us to lead and win and have margins and pricing that fits a brand that always delivers premium input and a premium position.
